title: Fry Fat With This 5-Move Kettlebell Workout​ | Men’s Health

organizations.name: kettlebell workout​ | men’s health your privacy rights canadian customers  this

text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
This workout from Miami-based personal trainer Idalis Velazquez is fast and furious as you move through 5 challenging exercises with no rest. That means you'll be getting a crazy amount of cardio without ever stepping on a treadmill, and your metabolism will be switched on to high. You'll also strengthen every muscle from head to toe—especially your core and shoulders. (Get dozens of free workouts on your phone with the FREE Men’s Health App. Download it here .) 
Directions: Perform the exercises below in the order listed: Advertisement
